authority.description: authority is the address that controls the module (defaults to x/gov unless overwritten).

MsgCommunityPoolSpend.title: Msg Community Pool Spend
MsgCommunityPoolSpend.description: MsgCommunityPoolSpend defines a message for sending tokens from the community pool to another account. This message is typically executed via a governance proposal with the governance module being the executing authority. Since: cosmos-sdk 0.47

cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.title: Coin
cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.description: Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount. NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method signatures required by gogoproto.
